mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food_spots ( name, address, phone_number, opening_time, closing_time, food_spot_owner_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{openingTime}, #{closingTime}, #{owner.id} )
mapper.select:
SELECT fs.id AS foodspot_id, fs.name AS foodspot_name, fs.address AS foodspot_address, fs.phone_number AS foodspot_phone, fs.opening_time, fs.closing_time,
o.id AS owner_id, o.name AS owner_name, o.surname AS owner_surname, o.phone_number AS owner_phone, o.email AS owner_email, o.business_license FROM food_spots fs JOIN food_spot_owners o ON fs.food_spot_owner_id = o.id WHERE fs.id = #{id}
